keyPages.title: Dev ready and easy to implement

signals: Trusted by 15 million+ designers and developers from over 280,000 companies worldwide

valueProps.text: Create, manage and implement lightweight animations

proof: Trusted by companies like Google, Disney, Nike, Uber, Spotify, Netflix, Microsoft, Airbnb, Amazon, Tiktok

facts.text: LottieFiles offers free lightweight animations for websites and apps.
facts.evidence: Download Free lightweight animations for website & apps.

facts.text: LottieFiles allows users to search for animations by keyword or upload an image for visual search.
facts.evidence: Search for animations by keyword or upload an image for visual search

facts.text: LottieFiles has a feature to add a 'Hire' button on profiles.
facts.evidence: Add a 'Hire' Button on to your profile

facts.text: LottieFiles enables creation, management, and implementation of animations across various platforms.
facts.evidence: Create, manage and implement lightweight animations across websites, apps, presentations, social and more.

facts.text: LottieFiles hosts over 800,000 free and premium animations.
LottieFiles is used by over 280,000 companies worldwide.
facts.evidence: Trusted by 15 million+ designers and developers from over 280,000 companies worldwide

facts.text: LottieFiles is trusted by major companies like Google, Disney, and Nike.
facts.evidence: Trusted by companies like Google, Disney, Nike, Uber, Spotify, Netflix, Microsoft, Airbnb, Amazon, Tiktok

facts.text: LottieFiles offers a 'Get started for free' option.
LottieFiles provides case studies for companies like Toss, Wise, and Gojek.
facts.evidence: case studies for companies like Toss, Wise, and Gojek

facts.text: LottieFiles supports theming in animations for limitless creativity.
facts.evidence: Theming in one file, limitless creativity
